person_say: I'm feeling really sad because my relationship isn't going well. Is there anything that could help comfort me?
animal_say: Let's introduce you to Bruno, the wise bear who specializes in mindfulness! He can help you find some comfort and peace during this tough time.

person_say: That sounds wonderful! I would love to meet Bruno and learn some mindfulness techniques to help me feel better.
animal_say: Yay! Here comes Bruno, your mindfulness guru! Get ready to embark on a journey to inner peace!
